name: Angry Cats (Bepary Games)
description:
Bepary Games

Angry Cats

Game information/description

This game is a game about Angry cats killing birds. Any PC frm the 2010s can run this game.

Controls

  • Right click and hold to throw the cats.
  • To pause the game press P.
  • To exit the game press E.
  • To restart the game press R.
  • To go back to the main menu press M

System requirements:

Windows:

  • Windows Xp or above
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics
  • 1GHz CPU

Mac OS X:

  • Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
  • 1GB RAM
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Ubuntu:

  • Ubuntu 14 or above
  • OpenGL-capable graphics card with valid driver
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Note: this game runs only on Windows but you can use Wine to use this game on other platforms.

Some of the resources in this game might be from other publishers. This game is for educational purposese only.
